generatedTitle: "School of Rock: Broadway Show Based on Film"

extractFactDictList.question: When did the Broadway show 'School of Rock' start previews?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Broadway show 'School of Rock' started previews on November 9, 2015, and officially opened on December 6.

extractFactDictList.question: What is the story of 'School of Rock' based on?
extractFactDictList.sentence: It was based on the film of the same name and tells the story of a wannabe rock star named Dewey Finn, who poses as a substitute teacher at a prestigious prep school.

extractFactDictList.sentence: It was based on the film of the same name and tells the story of a wannabe rock star named Dewey Finn, who poses as a substitute teacher at a prestigious prep school.

extractFactDictList.question: What does Dewey Finn do when he discovers his students' musical talents?
extractFactDictList.sentence: When he discovers his students’ musical talents, he enlists his fifth-graders to form a rock group and conquer the Battle of the Bands.
